points.title: The service collects many different types of personal data

case.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
case.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...

points.title: The service gives 30 days of notice before closing your account

case.title: 30 days of notice are given before closing your account
case.description: The Terms explain they will notify users at least 30 days before closing their accounts, which allows users to limit the losses and damages caused by this termination.

points.title: When the service wants to change its terms, users are notified a month or more in advance

case.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance
case.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified at least 30 days in advance.

points.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

case.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
case.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

case.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
case.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.

points.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

case.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").

points.title: You can delete your content from this service

case.title: You can delete your content from this service
case.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: You maintain ownership of your data

case.title: You maintain ownership of your content
case.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.

points.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

case.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
case.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

case.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
case.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: You must create an account to use this service

case.title: You must create an account to use this service
case.description: You must provide the service with your information in order to use it

points.title: Your private content may be accessed by people working for the service

case.title: Your private content may be accessed by people working for the service

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

case.title: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you
case.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.

points.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

case.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

case.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

points.title: They can delete any of your data (files, music, messages, etc.) at any time and without notice
points.analysis: All the data that you have on iCloud can be removed or modified by Apple if they think it is inappropriate or “objectionable” to them. It can be done automatically with pre-screen, and without prior notice to you. Section: “Removal of Content” (content means all your data on iCloud, from files to software and messages): “Apple reserves the right at all times to determine whether Content is appropriate and in compliance with this Agreement, and may pre-screen, move, refuse, modify and/or remove Content at any time, without prior notice and in its sole discretion, if such Content is found to be in violation of this Agreement or is otherwise objectionable.”

case.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
case.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.

points.title: This service receives your location through GPS coordinates

case.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
case.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.

points.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: The service provides two factor authentification for your account

case.title: Two factor authentication is provided for your account
case.description: The service provides means of further securing your account with two factor authentification, thus greatly improving account security.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

case.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
case.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

points.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

case.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
case.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.
